body.name: Century Swap On Modular Travel System, Metro
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 22 hrs 29 mins
features: MAKE IT MOD: Modular reversible seat to face you or the great big world
HAPPY PLANET COLLECTION: Fabrics made with recycled materials as part of our Do More promise to Recycle, Reimagine, and Give Back
INCLUDES CENTURY CARRY ON 35 LIGHTWEIGHT INFANT CAR SEAT: For rear-facing infants 4-35 lb
CUSTOM COOL: Compatible with the Swap On Modular Stroller Bassinet and Swap On Modular 2-in-1 Stand (sold separately)
SELF-STANDING, COMPACT FOLD: Takes up less space in the trunk, closet, or wherever you stash it
body.description: Join the mod squad and roll your own way! Meet the sleek and versatile Century™ Swap On™ Modular Travel System that lets you choose which direction your little faces—toward you or the great big world. And, here's a cool trick: Our Modular Magician comes complete with the Carry On™ 35 Lightweight Infant Car Seat, for rear-facing infants 4-35 lb. It's also compatible with the Swap On™ Modular Stroller Bassinet (sold separately) so you can customize the right ride for your kiddo. Part of the Happy Planet Collection, the Swap On Modular Travel System is crafted with fabrics made with recycled materials. Plus, storage is a snap with the compact, self-standing fold. Keep your mini riding comfy with an extra-large canopy with visor for cooling shade, cozy harness covers, and multi-position reclining seat. The removable, washable child's tray is just right for snack time on the go. And for you? A large storage basket to hold ALL the things and a parent cup holder for your drink.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Century Swap On Modular Travel System Meet the Century Swap On Modular Travel System that lets you choose which direction your little faces—toward you or the world. It comes complete with the Carry On 35 Lightweight Infant Car Seat, or add the Swap On Bassinet (sold separately) for more ways to ride.

Car Seat & Base Included Includes Century Carry On Lightweight Infant Car Seat for rear-facing infants 4-35 lb. Roll Your Own Way Reversible, modular seat lets you choose which direction your little faces—toward you or the great big world. Switch It, Swap It Customize with the Swap On Bassinet (sold separately) for an extra-comfy option for your itty bitty. Take a Stand Add the Swap On 2-in-1 Stand (sold separately) and click your car seat straight in to keep baby resting cozy when you get home.

Happy Planet Collection Bringing our tiny humans into this great big world has only strengthened our commitment to take care of it—and each other. Here are some of the things we’re doing to help you feel good about choosing Century.

Happy Planet As part of our commitment to Do More, we take single-use plastic water bottles and break them down into chips that are then woven into fabrics for our Happy Planet Collection. Happy Kids No matter how many toys they have, your kid's favorite is inevitably a cardboard box. Inspired by our own kids, we share easy projects to turn packaging into playtime. Happy People We care passionately about supporting families of all shapes and sizes, so we partner with non-profits that support family services.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love everything about it!
reviews.reviewText: Me and my husband loved the price, the easy installation, how lightweight it is, and all the different set ups it offers! The underneath basket is extremely spacious as well! I especially loved how you can put the baby car seat on top of the toddler seat! I thought I would have a problem with the baby car seat cover as it is attached to the handle but fortunately I figured out you can always detach from the back if you need it out of the way as well. The quality is very high end too so I 10/10 recommend. Will update when baby arrives!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very light and practical
reviews.reviewText: It definitely meets my expectations, good quality, looks good and at an excellent price. I am fascinated by how light it is, being able to turn it so that the baby can observe the view or look at you. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My expectations were low and I was so wrong!
reviews.reviewText: I have never heard of this brand somehow (according to car seats for littles that’s shocking) and I didn’t expect much for quality but honestly I am so glad I bought this travel system as opposed to the one I was planning to buy. This is a graco brand apparently and they’re very safe, sturdy, easy to put together, and the stroller glides so well. I love the adjustable/interchangeable parts on the stroller too. I have seen lots of people complain about the canopy on the car seat because it makes carrying it difficult but there is a hack for it. Just google this car seat and canopy or carrying hack. You basically pull the canopy toward the handle instead of away since it’s attached to the handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I often don’t leave reviews but for this stroller and carseat combo I had to !!I love how it looks , how smooth it is and most of all how versatile it is ! You can turn the car seat both ways , as well as the seat ! Set up was about 15-20 min MAX !!! I will say the only thing I don’t like about the car seat is the canopy is not separate from the handle , it’s all together ! But overall I have to say a 10 out of 10 ! Our 2nd baby is due in Aug of 2024 and I will update again after using it with the baby !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Disclaimer to start----- Per the manufacturer this set is discounted on amazon because the set is an older manufacturer date. Mine was 10/2021; which means you already lost 2 years off the car seat life. I do wish this was transparent on Amazon.That said- This set is awesome. I bought as a gift and I know it is going to work great. The car seat is so lightweight and easy to adjust. The family will not need the infant seat more than a year or so, so the expiration isn't a big deal. The stroller is very versatile and light as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this stroller and car seat. It’s so easy to use and assemble. It’s super light weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight, stylish, affordable!
reviews.reviewText: My wife and I purchased two separate types of this stroller, and he absolutely love it! Not only is it environmental friendly, but it is extremely light weight as advertised! This was a big step from the original DOONA we had… Which was extremely heavy! The stroller is affordable and easy to use. I absolutely love it. I would highly suggest if you’re looking to purchase a traveling system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
